title: Forest guest house and Interpretation centre by Forest Dept
clause_text: Forest guest house and Interpretation centre by Forest Dept. blending with nature shall be allowed with ground floor only.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
